resources.string: Q1. Accounting entries involve a minimum of how many accounts?
Q2. The financial statement that reports the revenues and expenses for a period of time such as a year or a month is the ....?
Q3. The financial statement that reports the assets, liabilities, and stockholders (owners) equity at a specific date is the .....
Q4. Under the accrual basis of accounting, revenues are reported in the accounting period when the .....
Service or goods have been delivered
Service or goods have been planned
Q5. Resources owned by a company (such as cash, accounts receivable, vehicles) are reported on the balance sheet and are referred to as ....
Q6. Obligations (amounts owed) are reported on the balance sheet and are referred to as ....
Q7. Unearned Revenues is what type of account?
Q8. Prepaid insurance is reported as an __________ on a company balance sheet.
Q9. The first section of the statement of cash flows is the __________ activities.
Q10. A loan obtained will be presented under __________ activities.
